headline: Teaching
description: Since getting my pedagogy degree, I have taught at several schools, both in the public and private sectors. From 2018 - 2023 I also taught privately via my own company.
experience: Private tutoring at Pontus Ahlbäck, guitar & music

headline: Freelancing
description: Since starting my own business in 2015 I have been performing regularly as a soloist and chamber musician. I’ve also worked as a private teacher. In 2020 I also began producing videos, mainly for publishing concerts and performing arts videos.

headline: Programming
description: In 2023 I started studying to become a web developer. I am expected to graduate by June 2025. So far it’s been a lot of fun! Scroll down (or click the button below) to see my projects.
